scripts.build:web: emcmake cmake -B wbuild -G Ninja -D PNTR_APP_BUILD_DEMOS=ON -D PNTR_APP_BUILD_TEST=OFF && cmake --build wbuild
scripts.watch:web: npx -y nodemon -w example -e 'c h png' --exec 'npm run build:web'
scripts.build:raylib: cmake -B build -G Ninja -D PNTR_APP_BUILD_DEMOS=ON -D EXAMPLE=RAYLIB -D PNTR_APP_BUILD_TEST=OFF && cmake --build build
scripts.build:sdl2: cmake -B build -G Ninja -D PNTR_APP_BUILD_DEMOS=ON -D EXAMPLE=SDL2 -D PNTR_APP_BUILD_TEST=OFF && cmake --build build
scripts.build:retro: cmake -B build -G Ninja -D PNTR_APP_BUILD_DEMOS=ON -D EXAMPLE=RETRO -D PNTR_APP_BUILD_TEST=OFF && cmake --build build
scripts.test: cmake -B build -G Ninja -D PNTR_APP_BUILD_DEMOS=OFF -D PNTR_APP_BUILD_TEST=ON && cmake --build build
